'''Decree of the Deeps''' is a [[Character Event Wish]] in [[Version 4.5]].

==Wish Details==
===Duration===
* 2024-04-02 18:00:00 &mdash; 2024-04-23 14:59:00

===Summary===
* In this event wish, the event-exclusive 5-star character {{Wish Item|Neuvillette}} will get a huge drop-rate boost!
* During this event wish, the 4-star characters {{Wish Item|Barbara;Xingqiu;Yanfei}}  will receive a huge drop-rate boost!
* Of the above characters, the event-exclusive character will not be available in the standard wish "[[Wanderlust Invocation]]."
* For information about rates, see [[Wish]]es.
